short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy the beautiful images from the ESA/Hubble Space Telescope Top 100 images collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension takes a random image from our collection of 100 best images and renders it when the user opens a new browser tab. In the lower left corner the logo of our official site is displayed next to the title and image credit.
